page.title: 20HEALTH
page.content: THIS PART OF THE{SURVEY}WAS FOR MEN & WOMEN AGED{20_30}&{40_50 }FROM {BEECHWOOD,C OF E}&{RIVERMEAD.}ONLY 3 {BEECHWOOD}LADIES AGED{40-50}WERE {DISABLED}. ONLY ONE MAN WANTED A {HOSPITAL}BUILT IN THIS AREA. 33% AND 50% OF BEECHWOOD MEN AND WOMEN AND 50% AND 45% OF RIVERMEAD MEN AND WOMEN. OUT OF THE{23}TAKING PART FIVE WISHED TO LIVE IN AN{OLD FOLKS HOME, {17 AT}HOME AND 1 WITH {RELATIVES.}MEN FROM RIVERMEAD &{LADIES}FROM{BEECHWOOD {WHERE COMPARED ON HOW MANY}TIMES YEARLY THEY WENT TO THE{DENTIST. (AGED {40-50) 60%}OF THE LADIES AND{78%}OF THE MEN WENT TO THE{DENTIST}TWICE YEAR. NONE OF THE MEN WENT TO THE {DENTIST}3 TIMES IN A YEAR WHILE{10%} OF THE LADIES DID. ONLY ONE OF THE MEN WENT REGULARLY,{30%}OF THE LADIES WENT ONCE A YEAR WHILE{11%}OF THE MEN DID.
